content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [silver].[suppliers_master]
( 
	[SupplierID] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[SupplierName] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Country] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[AvgLeadTimeDays] [int]  NULL,
	[DefectRate] [decimal](4,3)  NULL,
	[OnTimeDeliveryRate] [decimal](4,3)  NULL,
	[RankScore] [decimal](4,2)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
